data.name: RED
data.detailed_description:
Set out on a fantasy sci-fi adventure in a tale of revenge based on the Little Red Riding Hood fairytale.

Years after the Wolf's attack at her Grandmother's house, RED has re-emerged to exact revenge on the biggest and baddest of all the Wolf‘s...
Oh, and bring their entire frickin’ floating city crashing into the ocean below.
RED’s not here to play.

Explore an open world filled with secrets, upgrades and lore bringing various fairytale character's and creatures into the sci-fi world of RED. Battle massive creatures and take on the Wolf's minions as you fight to avenge you Grandmother.
